name: Johnny_Carson
text:
Johnny Carson
Johnny Carson was the host of The Tonight Show.
Annually, Carson would film his show on the West Coast. One 1969 taping in Los Angeles was attended by newlyweds Hank and Norma Jennings.
Behind the scenes
Johnny Carson (October 23, 1925 – January 23, 2005) was an American television host, comedian, writer, and producers best known for hosting The Tonight Show from 1962 to 1992.
